body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting CarDeals Customer Support. My name is Brian Bryant. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Samantha. How many vehicles are you interested in purchasing from us?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am looking to purchase six vehicles for my company.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great! And approximately how much are you looking to spend in total for those six vehicles?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm considering spending two zero zero zero zero zero dollars for the purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that information, Samantha. Is there any specific make or model you are interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I am interested in luxury SUVs from brands like Mercedes and Audi.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect. Thank you for providing those details, Samantha. We will do our best to assist you with your purchase. Thank you for your time today.
